oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Special Issue of the Journal of Regulatory Science on Genetically Modified Organisms
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Molins, Ricardo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: genetically modified organims
regulatory science
editorial
genetically modified organisms
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Journal of Regulatory Science, now in the first year in continuous publication mode, is proud to publish its first Special Issue, which examines some proposals from industry to facilitate the structuring of a more widely accepted, science based, standardized future international regulatory framework for approval of genetically modified organisms. doi: 10.21423/jrs-v09i1molins
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Office of the Texas State Chemist
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Journal of Regulatory Science; Vol. 9 No. 1 (2021): Special Issue on Genetically Modified Organisms; i-iii
